availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Sneed (Franklin County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah H. Sneed. Father of Anne E. Sneed, John L. Sneed, Russell Sneed, Sarah H. Sneed, and William C. Sneed. Physician in Franklin County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Physician in Franklin County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Franklin County, District 1, p. 127B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Franklin County, District 1, p. 860.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 259.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 491B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 34B.
Find A Grave, "William Clark Sneed (1812-1862)," Memorial #63969571, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/63969571 (accessed October 23, 2019).
